a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of anemia in children, 2000 to 2019
Prevalence of anemia in children, measured as the share of children under the age of five with hemoglobin levels
less than 110 grams per liter at sea level.
Data source: World Health Organization (via World Bank)
